channel.title: 卞懂の小破站
channel.description:
卞懂的个人博客

佛说：不要只盯着这个季节，错过了今冬，明年才懂得珍惜。
- Dr. Bian

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description:
The world is like a mirror; frown at it and it frowns at you; smile and it smiles too. 放下担子，过随遇而安的生活。

抛弃曾经的吐槽，类似“QQ说说”的博文。

一切重新开始。

Hello~

item.title: About
item.description:
This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You love Minimalism, and you also love writing, Dahab is designed for you. Dahab focus on showing your content in a clean and simple way, focus on images, typography, and white space.
